title: Gel Manicure
subtitle: Long-lasting shine with a clean finish
details: Careful prep, gel application, shaping, and glossy finishing. Ideal for long wear.

title: Spa Pedicure
subtitle: Full care and relaxation
details: Soak, exfoliation, cuticle care, hydration, light massage, and polish application.

title: Acrylic Set
subtitle: Structure and elegance
details: Acrylic application with a customized shape. Works with a variety of lengths and styles.

title: Nail Art
subtitle: Custom designs
details: Add a diamond touch: patterns, chrome, ombré, fine details. Price varies by complexity.

title: Removal + Care
subtitle: Gentle and protective
details: Gentle removal, shaping, nourishing treatment, and protective finish.
